DOC.brief_summary: An indirect comparison to compare the efficacy of eltrombopag versus romiplostim
DOC.detailed_description: An indirect analysis was conducted to evaluate the relative efficacy of eltrombopag and romiplostim using placebo as a common comparator
DOC.criteria: Adults with ITP Prespecified treatment Prospective clinical studies with at least 10 patients Adults with ITP for other reasons
